name: Riven
title: the Exile
lore: Once a swordmaster in the warhosts of Noxus, Riven is an expatriate in a land she previously tried to conquer. She rose through the ranks on the strength of her conviction and brutal efficiency, and was rewarded with a legendary runic blade and a warband of her own. However, on the Ionian front, Riven's faith in her homeland was tested and ultimately broken. Having severed all ties to the empire, she now seeks to find her place in a shattered world, even as rumors abound that Noxus itself has been reforged...
blurb: Once a swordmaster in the warhosts of Noxus, Riven is an expatriate in a land she previously tried to conquer. She rose through the ranks on the strength of her conviction and brutal efficiency, and was rewarded with a legendary runic blade and a...
allytips: Riven's Broken Wings locks onto the champion your cursor is over at the time of cast. If you want to move past your opponent, make sure that your cursor is past your opponent as well.
Riven lacks a source of healing or strong defense and must compensate with burst combos. Lead into fights with Broken Wings and Ki Burst, while using Valor to escape and absorb counter-harass.
enemytips: Riven has a great deal of mobility but she cannot move very far with any one skill. Rooting or silencing her during her combo will greatly reduce her effectiveness.
All of Riven's damage is physical, prioritize high Armor if an opposing Riven gets out of control.

Riven excels at dueling multiple melee attackers at once, as she will be on an almost equal footing damage-wise. If pairing up against Riven, don't go in as double melee until she has expended her full combo.

riot_spell_q.name: Broken Wings
riot_spell_q.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Riven strikes out in front of her in a short line. This ability may be re-cast {{ e4 }} additional times.

1st and 2nd Use: Slashes forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all units she comes in contact with.
3rd Use: Leaps forward and slams the ground dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocking nearby enemies up. This leap can cross unpathable terrain.

Riven will target the unit your cursor is hovering over, or if no targets are present, Riven will simply strike the direction she is currently facing.

riot_spell_w.name: Ki Burst
riot_spell_w.description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
riot_spell_w.tooltip: Riven's sword emits a burst of runic energy that shocks nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ f1 }})</scaleAD> physical damage and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

riot_spell_e.name: Valor
riot_spell_e.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
riot_spell_e.tooltip: Riven does a quick dash in the direction of your cursor and becomes shielded, blocking up to {{ e2 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ f1 }})</scaleAD> incoming damage for 1.5 seconds.

riot_spell_r.name: Blade of the Exile
riot_spell_r.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Riven's weapon surges with spiritual energy for {{ duration }} seconds, granting her {{ percentbonusad*100 }}% extra Attack Damage ({{ bonusad }}), increased Range on her damaging spells and attacks, and the ability to use Wind Slash once.

Wind Slash: Riven fires a shockwave that deals from {{ mindamage }} to {{ maxdamage }} physical damage to all enemies hit, increasing based on how much Health they are missing.

riot_spell_i.name: Runic Blade
riot_spell_i.description: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Runic Blade
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Riven's''' blade gains a ''Charge'' for 6 seconds every time she uses an ability (stacks up to 3 times). '''Riven's''' [[basic attack]]s consume a ''Charge'' to deal {{as|{{pp|6|key=%|25 to 50|1;6 to 18|displayformula = 25%+5% at level 6, then+5% every 3 levels}} AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: ''Runic Blade'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|100|melee}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* ''Runic Blade's'' duration refreshes whenever ''Riven'' gains or consumes a stack.
* The bonus damage applies {{sti|life steal}}.
* ''Runic Blade'' does not affect structures (charges are not consumed when attacking them).
* ''Runic Blade'' can be {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, or {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}.
* ''Runic Blade'' charges are not be consumed if ''Riven'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} when landing the enhanced attack.
* ''Runic Blade'' charges do not proc against wards.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Broken Wings
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} towards the target nearest to the cursor or in the direction she is currently facing, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in front of her. ''Broken Wings'' can then be reactivated twice within the next 4 seconds, with the second cast refreshing the timer.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|15 to 95}} {{as|(+ {{ap|45 to 65}}% AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|15*3 to 95*3}} {{as|(+ {{ap|45*3 to 65*3}}% AD)}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.description2: {{tt|The third cast|This can cross terrain}} {{tip|airborne|knocks up}} and damages all enemies around '''Riven''' in an expanded radius.
wikia_skill_q1.description3: Each ''Broken Wings'' cast causes her next basic attack to occur more quickly. This is not considered a basic attack timer reset.
wikia_skill_q1.effect_radius: {{tt|{{fd|112.5}}|Standard first casts range}} / {{tt|150|Standard final cast range}} / {{tt|{{fd|162.5}}|Enhanced first casts range}} / {{tt|200|Enhanced final cast range}}
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* Each cast triggers {{nie|Spellblade}} and counts as a charge for {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* Since it's not considered a basic attack reset it does not count for {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the third cast.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Ki Burst
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven's''' sword emits a burst of runic energy that shocks nearby enemies, dealing {{as|physical damage}} and applying a {{tip|stun}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Valor
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} in the direction of the cursor, {{sti|shield|shielding}} herself for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* ''Valor'' can be used to bypass player-created terrain ({{ai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{ai|Cataclysm|Jarvan IV}}) but not to go through walls.
* ''Valor'' cannot be cast while ''Riven'' is {{tip|root|rooted}}.

wikia_skill_r2.name: Wind Slash
wikia_skill_r2.blurb: Riven unleashes a powerful ranged attack, which she may do once during Blade of the Exile.
wikia_skill_r2.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' unleashes a wave of energy in a cone, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies hit, increased by {{as|{{pp|9|type='''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 200|key1=%|0 to 75|formula=2.667% per 1% missing health. ''This is capped at 200% bonus damage at 75% missing health.''}}|health}}.
wikia_skill_r2.leveling: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|100 to 200}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Physical Damage|{{ap|100*3 to 200*3}} {{as|(+ 180% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
